markdown: ... [NotesReview](https://ent8r.github.io/NotesReview/), which you can use to search for OSM notes using search terms?
... [NotesReview](https://ent8r.github.io/NotesReview/)? Which allows easy browsing of OSM Notes across the globe.

... there are many ways to contribute regularly to OSM?

Desktop:
    [OSM Streak](http://streak.osmz.ru/)
    [MapRoulette](https://maproulette.org/)
    [Pic4Review](https://pic4review.pavie.info/#/)
    [Unmapped Places](https://resultmaps.neis-one.org/unmapped#5/47.100/9.800)
    [Find Suspicious OpenStreetMap Changesets](https://resultmaps.neis-one.org/osm-suspicious#2/10.1/14.4)
    [OSMCha](https://osmcha.org/)
    [NotesReview](https://ent8r.github.io/NotesReview/)
    [Many Tasking Managers](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tasking_Manager)

Smartphone:
    [StreetComplete](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/StreetComplete)
    [Every Door](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Every_Door)
    [Vespucci](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Vespucci)
    [OSMfocus Reborn](https://pfiers.net/projects/osmfocus-reborn/)
    [OSM Go!](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Osm_Go!)
    [Jungle Bus](https://junglebus.io/en/mobility-open-data-proudly-crafted-by-the-openstreetmap-community-2/)

We are sure we have forgotten some. Please write to us and let us know, we will add them next week.

ENT8R has developed a [website](https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/talk/2018-April/080509.html) called [Notes Review](https://ent8r.github.io/NotesReview/). It enables you to perform a full text search of OSM Notes and view them quickly.

The Austrian community has taken a collective approach in processing about 5000 map notes and about 2000 notes have already been closed in a short time. Currently, less than 3000 are still open. If you also want to help, there are a number of useful tools available:

  [An overview of all notes in Austria](https://resultmaps.neis-one.org/osm-notes-country?c=Austria)
  [A list of all open notes](https://resultmaps.neis-one.org/osm-notes-country-custom?c=Austria&query=open)
  [A list of the oldest notes per country](https://observablehq.com/@vgeorge/oldest-osm-notes-by-country)
  [A URL that displays a random note (suitable as a bookmark)](https://brzozo.ws/random-note/AT)
  The tools [NotesReview](https://ent8r.github.io/NotesReview/) and [NoteViewer](https://antonkhorev.github.io/osm-note-viewer/) for viewing local notes.
  [The JOSM plugin noteSolver for automatic assignment of changesets and notes](https://github.com/kmpoppe/noteSolver)
